favourite.article: Hallelujah for the heavens full of joy.
I knew this Hymn before but I didn't knew if the lyrics was of Fanny J. Crosby.

We will never never be tired of the grand old song! Halleluyah!!! We will continue to sing till we see the face of our Lord Jesus Christ in glory over there in Heaven. Praise the Lord! Heaven is full of Joy! Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!
There weâ€™ll praise our glorious Savior with the blessed throng: Glory to God, hallelujah!
Hallelujah! One of my favorites ever.
There is hope for me at the end of the journey. Thorns/thistle are not my problem,/to reign with God is my concern.
One of the most joyful song I've ever heard from our hymns collection. It's great for putting some joy in the house at worship time...
